column4: wx is crossplatform on source code level... so you still need binaries compiled in linux
does that mean I have to use wine if the only file offered is .exe?
that, or you could compile it yourself if you can get hold of the sources (which you should be able to since it's sourceforge project)
I would love to compile it myself - I'm going to read up on compiling and look for the source files.  Thank you
